overview: Exploring the powerful imagery of men having sex with other men while in uniform, it features fifteen hung studs in 8 separate stories about cops and their intense desires. Real men, in real cop fantasies. First, police sergeant Erik is in charge at the police academy and is known for making it hard on his students. Rookie Jason gets to the bottom of his sexual urges with Erik, while both smoke cigars. Next, highway patrolman Brian bottoms for leather biker Joe, then oral mouth-stuffing is the way to go for muscle cop Ron and rookie Jim. Next, sergeant Erik arrests Bear and Joe for a three-way. Officer Jake gets in a three-way scene with leather muscleman Thor and his accomplice Brian. Next, in jail Anthony plows the shit out of Rob. Finally cigar smoking officer Hank ruts his way through an uncooperative victim.
tagline: Fifteen hung studs in 8 separate stories about cops and their intense sexual desires... real men in real cop fantasies!
title: Cop Tales
